channel.title: Reflection help
channel.description:
I keep getting this error when trying to use reflection with an rsps:
java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Uncompilable source code - cannot find symbol symbol: class Stream location: class Reflection at Reflection.<clinit>(Reflection.java:20) Exception in thread "main" Java Result: 1 BUILD SUCCESSFUL (total time: 0 seconds)
Any ideas? sorry if I'm being a noob.

item.title: Reflection help
item.dc:creator: @Calibix Calibix
item.description:
@Calibix wrote:

I keep getting this error when trying to use reflection with an rsps:

java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Uncompilable source code - cannot find symbol
symbol: class Stream
location: class Reflection
at Reflection.(Reflection.java:20)
Exception in thread “main” Java Result: 1
BUILD SUCCESSFUL (total time: 0 seconds)

Any ideas? sorry if I’m being a noob.

Read full topic
